greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The largest square which divides n-th central binomial coefficient.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[First@ Select[Reverse@ Divisors@ Binomial[n, Floor[n/2]], IntegerQ@ Sqrt@ # &], {n, 72}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 18 2017 *)
a[n_] := Times @@ (First[#]^(2*Floor[Last[#]/2]) & /@ FactorInteger[Binomial[n, Floor[n/2]]]); Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 06 2020 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 26 2000
